meals.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with rich meat sauce.

meals.description: Traditional Italian pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.

meals.name: Grilled Chicken
meals.description: Juicy grilled chicken breast with lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise on a toasted bun.

meals.name: BBQ Ribs
